abstract.p: Right wing Mark Parrish discusses joining New York Islanders (S)

block.p: Roman Hamrlik, the defenseman obtained from Edmonton in a trade last Saturday, was not too keen about joining the Islanders. Mark Parrish, the right wing acquired the same day from Florida, can't wait to join them.

''I am really excited about getting a chance to play a bigger role on an up-and-coming team,'' said Parrish, 23, who was acquired from the Panthers along with center Oleg Kvasha in exchange for goalie Roberto Luongo and forward Olli Jokinen. I have heard nothing but great things about Coach Butch Goring, how well he works with young players.

Roman Hamrlik, the defenseman obtained from Edmonton in a trade last Saturday, was not too keen about joining the Islanders. Mark Parrish, the right wing acquired the same day from Florida, can't wait to join them.

''I am really excited about getting a chance to play a bigger role on an up-and-coming team,'' said Parrish, 23, who was acquired from the Panthers along with center Oleg Kvasha in exchange for goalie Roberto Luongo and forward Olli Jokinen. I have heard nothing but great things about Coach Butch Goring, how well he works with young players.
Hamrlik initially voiced unhappiness with leaving Edmonton for Long Island, saying he wanted to play in the playoffs.
